name: Project: Eden's Garden
storyline:
Eden's Garden Academy, a school designed to find the best and brightest of America's youth, has prepared a special orientation for its very first cohort of Ultimate students.

But things are not so clear when Damon Maitsu, the Ultimate Debater, finds himself waking up in a strange academy. With his 15 other classmates stuck in the same situation, they are told that a killing game will commence.

It's up to Damon and his classmates to survive this killing game, and uncover the secrets that lay buried under the mystery that surrounds Eden's Garden Academy.
summary: Project: Eden's Garden is a non-profit Danganronpa fangame. Taking the formula of the murder-mystery video game and applying it to an entirely new world, with new characters and stories to tell, this is a small project that is dedicated to recreating the magic the works that inspired it.
